channel.title: CVE Feed for impleCode -- eCommerce Product Catalog Plugin for WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for impleCode -- eCommerce Product Catalog Plugin for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2023-1470|2023-03-17T13:13:15.254Z -- implecode -- ecommerce%20product%20catalog%20plugin%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The eCommerce Product Catalog plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via some of its settings parameters in versions up to, and including, 3.3.8 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with administrator-level permissions and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page. This only affects multi-site installations and installations where unfiltered_html has been disabled.

item.title: CVE-2023-47839|2023-11-22T23:22:55.536Z -- implecode -- ecommerce%20product%20catalog%20plugin%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in impleCode eCommerce Product Catalog Plugin for WordPress plugin <= 3.3.26 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-51688|2023-12-29T14:53:55.107Z -- implecode -- ecommerce%20product%20catalog%20plugin%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in impleCode eCommerce Product Catalog Plugin for WordPress.This issue affects eCommerce Product Catalog Plugin for WordPress: from n/a through 3.3.26.

item.title: CVE-2023-25049|2023-04-07T11:12:16.983Z -- implecode -- ecommerce%20product%20catalog%20plugin%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in impleCode eCommerce Product Catalog Plugin for WordPress plugin <= 3.3.4 versions.
